sentence.text: The aim of the study was to understand the role of axon guidance-homophilic cell adhesion via plasma membrane adhesion molecules/2-actin cytoskeleton organization signalling pathways in development of breast cancer (BC).

entity.text: homophilic cell adhesion via plasma membrane adhesion molecules

sentence.text: Significantly, higher alteration of axon guidance locus was observed in triple negative breast cancer (TNBC) over signal transduction subtype (P = 0.0014).
Results indicate the importance of axon guidance-homophilic cell adhesion via plasma membrane adhesion molecules-actin cytoskeleton organization signalling pathway in predicting tumour progression.

entity.text: homophilic cell adhesion via plasma membrane adhesion molecules
